title: shrI mari sutanE
sahitya:
shrI mari sutanE tiruvaDi sharaNam


anupallavi

  mA dayAparA paranena tara varu mAnuvEl enum 
anukula varanE nidam unai muzhu manaduDan aDi pADi


caraNam 1    AvalAga tudittiDu tirunAthA jIvalOka vazhi taru uruvOnE dEvadEvan ena 
tigazhum ulagavaruDan magizh ulagarum maDi tozhudiDa-tudi peru
    caraNam 2    abhirAmagizh aruL puri shIlA bhAva shApam ara varum arikOlA
vAna lOkamadil arubigaL oLi tarum maNiyena nidamanamalaroDu tozhudiDu
